news: [Thanks to all GitHub contributors] Anyone can contribute and do code reviews, improve documentation and create pull request. Share you contribution and add a Star to GitHub at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection
[Contribute to the wiki] Open a pull request to improve documentation at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki
[News] Automatic report is restored in v0.98, use it to translate menus and buttons and to open issues to GitHub directly from jSQL toolbar

[Test reports] The auto-generated reports created on commit are now published to the wiki, you can review reports at https://github.com/ron190/jsql-injection/wiki/Programming-jSQL#generated-documentation-and-metrics
